name: Cave Fall
description:
Cave Fall is a story about one young magician on a way from town to home, but he slipped right into cave that is just about to start crushing! Your objective is to use your magical abilities to pickup, rotate and place magical shapes to make your way back home.

LMB - Place shape
RMB - Pickup shape

Scroll Whell - Rotate a shape

Warning!

This game is hard, but if you can't accomplish it or don't wan't to be limited by time or limited lives, you can turn on the "Assist Mode" that you can find in options. But we highly suggest you to not turn this thing on in your first playthrough.
